org.opendaylight.controller.switchmanager

Interface ISwitchManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwitchManager

    public interface ISwitchManager
    Primary purpose of this interface is to provide methods for application to access various system resources and inventory data including nodes, node connectors and their properties, Layer3 configurations, Span configurations, node configurations, network device representations viewed by Controller Web applications.

      • createProperty

        Property createProperty(java.lang.String propName,
                      java.lang.String propValue)
        Create a Name/Tier/Bandwidth Property object based on given property name and value. Other property types are not supported yet.
        Parameters:
        propName - Name of the Property specified by Property and its extended classes
        propValue - Value of the Property specified by Property and its extended classes
        Returns:
        Property

      • getNodeDescription

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getNodeDescription(Node node)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the description for the specified node. It is either the one configured by user or the description advertised by the node.
        Parameters:
        node - the network node identifier
        Returns:
        the description of the specified node. If no description is configured and the network node does not provide its description, an empty string is returned.
